title: How many world tokens will you be able to get with the master pass ?
body: So I bought the master pass in hope to get both the Championship Ashe Chroma and Icon and Border. I kinda thought about it though and I already bought the border. Will I still have enough if I complete every mission to get the Chroma ?

replies.body: Per the [announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/esports/esports-editorial/worlds-2017-missions-loot) page, the mission passes are worth 560 tokens if you started at week one.  The free missions will offer a very limited amount.  Make sure to check out that site for a precise breakdown of tokens awarded for each mission.
